entry.title: Ecopax - Foam Hinged Sandwich Container Black 5.94"x 5.5"x 3.38"- 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ecopax
Type: Disposables
Price: 42.99

Ecopax - 225 - Foam Hinged Sandwich Container - 4 x 125/Case

1-Comp, Non-Vented, Hinged Foam Containers, Ceres/Plain
Size: 
5.94 x 5.5 x 3.38

Convenient and efficient, this foam container is perfect for your take out service or packaging patrons' leftovers. From to-go cheesesteaks at your Italian restaurant to cold cut subs in your cafe, this all-purpose clamshell container is a reliable and convenient item for your business. The design is ideal for hot and cold subs, side orders, appetizers, kids' meals, and more! Featuring a hinged lid, this container can be quickly and easily closed to keep up with the fast-paced environment of your restaurant or take out venue.

With secure closure tabs, this tightly sealed container is protected against accidental openings and spills during transport, giving your guests peace of mind knowing their meal is tightly contained. Plus, the insulated foam construction ensures your patrons' food remains hot or chilled until they are ready to eat, plus the foam material makes it a more cost-efficient option over other materials.

Streamline your takeout service with this foam hinged lid container. Made of foamed polystyrene, this container is conveniently lightweight, but still able to support heavy foods. To prevent unwanted messes and spills, this container features a double locking lid closure, allowing for safe, convenient transport. Plus, the non-absorbent foam construction prevents any liquids from leaking through. With the ability to hold cold and hot foods, this foam vessel is great for serving guests at your picnic, party, or catered event!

Featuring a classic hinged lid design, this container offers convenience and a compact style to suit your takeout needs. In addition, each container has molded-in stacking rims, allowing customers to safely carry multiple meals at once. This clamshell container is also insulated to reduce heat transfer, and keep hot and cold dishes at the proper serving temperature throughout an entire meal. Once all the food is gone, enjoy a quick and effortless clean-up thanks to its convenient disposability.

entry.title: SB-SP-0054 Dinner Top Fold 9" x 4 3/4" x 2 9/16" Food Container - 250/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 57.99

Send your delicious food home with guests in this paper take-out container!

From entrees to desserts, customers can enjoy their leftovers in style thanks to this take out Box. Great for your bakery, restaurant, bistro, or catered event, this versatile container is the perfect size for entrees, sides, and desserts. It's an excellent option to house a variety of foods, while the attractive color provides a professional feel for your customer's food-to-go.

With four flaps and a tab lock on top, this container ensures that your patrons' food stays fresh and at the perfect temperature, and also that no spills or messes occur during transportation.

This sustainable product is ideal for businesses wishing to reduce ecological impact. Plut, it features a poly-coated interior that makes it leak- and grease-resistant.

No need to worry about retrieving or washing. Once guests are done, they can simply dispose of this container for easy, hassle-free clean up!

Foldable paper boxes are great for take-out foods, rice, pasta, chicken wings, sandwiches and salads.

entry.title: Pactiv - Y82535 - 8" Aluminum Foil Deep Pie Plates - 560/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pactiv
Type: Disposables
Price: 149.99

Bake perfect pies every time in this foil pie pan!

Perfect for display, you can use this pie pan in bakeries or restaurants to sell miniature pies. It's also great for use in merchandising settings where pies are ready for grab-and-go service. Your kitchen will move quickly and efficiently with this convenient Baker's Mark pie pan.

Durable Material

This aluminum foil pie pan is sturdy enough to withstand travel and works well for baking and storing delicious pies from apple crumb to blueberry or pumpkin! It is also disposable which makes clean up easier than ever because you won't need to spend time or energy washing and drying the pan when you're done with it.

Curl Rim

This foil pie pan features a full curl rim to aid in crust formation and provide support. It also makes the pie easier to serve.

Perfect Depth

Thanks to the perfect depth, this pan accommodates various dishes making it a great option for virtually any facility.

Pactiv - Y82535 - 8" Aluminum Deep Pie Plate - 560/Case

entry.title: MC - 9" Round Bagasse Biodegradable Plates 3 Compartment- 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: SmartChoice
Type: Disposables
Price: 64.99

Biodegradable Compostable Bagasse Round Plates 

Serve entrees and shared platters on this sugarcane / bagasse round plate.

If you're looking for the convenience of disposable products without the environmental impact of plastic or foam, look no further than the compostable sugarcane / bagasse round plate. Perfect for both hot and cold foods, this plate is an ideal solution for quick-serve restaurants, caterers, and cafes.

Eco-Friendly Construction

Made from bagasse, a by-product of sugarcane processing, this product is compostable, which allows you to decrease your carbon footprint. While other disposable products are burned when thrown away causing air pollution, this can be renewed and recycled. In addition, this dinnerware is made with superior strength and won't break or crack under moderate pressure. It can even handle the messiest of menu items thanks to its oil proof design.

Wide Rim

Thanks to a wide rim, you can serve saucy foods on this plate without worrying about spills and messes.

Bright White Appearance

With a bright white color, this plate will fit almost any restaurant decor and theme while creating a clean and fresh canvas for any type of food.

Superior Alternative

This sugarcane / bagasse item takes up less storage space than other disposable alternatives, and it can hold heavier foods than either paper or Styrofoam. Plus, since it requires much less energy to produce, it saves on both energy and resources.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Genpak
Type: Disposables
Price: 139.99

Genpak - 54 Oz Plain Bucket - 300/Case

For hot food take-out with an eco-friendly edge, turn to this Genpak 54 Oz. grease resistant chicken bucket! This paper hot food bucket is ideal for serving fried chicken and other hot foods on the go. It's perfect for restaurants and to-go establishments, deli counters, too! The double wrapped treated paper construction increases insulation while ensuring the durability your customers depend on when taking their order on the road. At the same time, the poly liner contains grease and moisture, minimizing messes while preserving food quality.

In addition, each container has molded-in stacking rims, allowing customers to safely carry multiple meals at once. This clamshell container is also insulated to reduce heat transfer, and keep hot and cold dishes at the proper serving temperature throughout an entire meal. Once all the food is gone, enjoy a quick and effortless clean-up thanks to its convenient disposability.

Plus, the insulated foam construction ensures your patrons' food remains hot or chilled until they are ready to eat, plus the foam material makes it a more cost-efficient option over other materials.

Streamline your takeout service with this foam hinged lid container. Made of foamed polystyrene, this container is conveniently lightweight, but still able to support heavy foods. To prevent unwanted messes and spills, this container features a double locking lid closure, allowing for safe, convenient transport.
